metadata.title: CVE-2020-22628 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in LibRaw::stretch() function inlibraw\src\postprocessing\aspect_ratio.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22628` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1.3
libraw19 - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.19.5-1ubuntu1.3').
darktable package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
